casebody.data:
Mona Watson CLARK, Individually and as Executor for the Estate of Lewis M. Watson, petitioner,
v.
INTERNAL REVENUE SERVICE, et al. No. 13-647. Supreme Court of the United States Jan. 13, 2014. Case below, 529 Fed.Appx. 824 . Petition for writ of certiorari to the United States Court of Appeals for the Ninth Circuit denied.
